primary.description: Deep Jungle Green - Use for primary buttons, footer, strong text

secondary.description: Warm Sand/Gold - Use for accents, subheadings, hover states

background.description: Off-white/Cream - Main background, never pure white

accent.description: Terracotta - Use sparingly for sale tags or urgent CTAs

grids.product_grid: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-x-8 gap-y-16
grids.bento_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8 auto-rows-[minmax(300px,auto)]

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-4 hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-primary text-primary rounded-full px-8 py-4 hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-primary hover:text-secondary transition-colors duration-200 underline-offset-4 hover:underline

cards.product_image_inner: object-cover w-full h-full transition-transform duration-700 group-hover:scale-105

inputs.base: rounded-xl border-primary/20 bg-white/50 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all duration-200

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlays on solid backgrounds to add depth.

hero.alt: Woman walking into serene tropical water

collection_1.alt: Elegant woman in black swimsuit in water

setup: Install dependencies: yarn add lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge
Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined in design_system.
Update index.css with the css_vars defined in design_system.
general_rules: Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (scale, color change, or shadow).
Product cards should be minimal: Image is hero, text is subtle below.
Use the 'texture_overlay' image with low opacity (5-10%) on the main background if possible for a premium feel.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle textures.
Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic centered layouts without purpose.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
